maqras.text: 36|28|Ara amara tara pare tara sampradayera birud'dhe asamana theke kono bahini patha'ini ebam pathanora'o chilama na [1].
36|29|Seta chila sudhumatra eka bikata sabda. Phale tara nithara nistabdha haye gela.
36|30|Paritapa bandadera jan'ya [1]; tadera kache yakhana'i kono rasula eseche takhana'i tara tara sathe thatta-bidrupa kareche [2].
36|31|Tara ki laksya kare na, amara tadera age bahu prajanmake dhbansa karechi [1]? Niscaya tara tadera madhye phire asabe na.
36|32|Ara niscaya tadera saba'ike ekatre amadera kache upasthita kara habe [1].
36|33|Ara tadera jan'ya ekati nidarsana mrta yamina, yake amara sanjibita kari ebam ta theke bera kari sasya, atahpara ta theke'i tara kheye thake.
36|34|Ara sekhane amara srsti kari khejura o angurera udyana ebam sekhane utsarita kari kichu prasrabana
36|35|yate tara khete pare tara phalamula hate athaca tadera hata eta srsta kareni. Tabu'o ki tara krtajnata prakasa karabe na
36|36|pabitra o mahana tini, yini srsti karechena sakala prakara srsti, yamina theke utpanna udbhida ebam tadera (manusadera) madhya theke'o (purusa o nari). Ara tara ya jane na ta theke'o [1].
36|37|Ara tadera jan'ya eka nidarsana rata, ta theke amara dina apasarita kari, takhana tara andhakaracchanna haye pare [1].
36|38|Ara surya bhramana kare tara nirdista gantabyera dike [1], eta parakramasali, sarbajnera nirdharana.
36|39|Ara camdera jan'ya nirdista karechi bibhinna man‌yila; abasese seta suska bamka, purono khejura sakhara akare phire yaya.
36|40|Suryera pakse sambhaba naya camdera nagala pa'oya ebam ratera pakse sambhaba naya dinake atikramakari ha'oya. Ara pratyeke nija nija kaksapathe samtara kate.
36|41|Ara tadera jan'ya nidarsana e'i ye, amara tadera bansadharaderake bojha'i nauyane aharana kariyechilama [1]
36|42|ebam tadera jan'ya anurupa yanabahana srsti karechi yate tara arohana kare [1].
36|43|Ara amara iccha karale taderake nimajjita karate pari; se abasthaya tadera kono ud'dharakari thakabe na ebam tara paritrana'o pabe na
36|44|amara paksa theke rahamata na hale ebam kichu kalera jan'ya jibanopabhoga karate na dile.
36|45|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, 'ya tomadera samane o tomadera pichane rayeche se byapare taka'oya abalambana kara [1]; yate tomadera upara rahamata kara haya
36|46|ara yakhana'i tadera rabera ayatasamuhera kono ayata tadera kache ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukha phiriye neya.

36|47|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, 'allah tomaderake ye riyika diyechena ta theke byaya kara' takhana kaphirara muminaderake bale, 'yake allah iccha karale kha'oyate paratena amara ki take kha'oyaba? Tomara to spasta bibhrantite rayecha.
36|48|Ara tara bale, 'tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala, e pratisruti kakhana purna habe
36|49|tara to apeksaya ache eka bikata sabdera, ya taderake aghata karabe tadera baka-bitandakale [1].
36|50|Takhana tara osiyata karate samartha habe na ebam nijedera paribara-parijanadera kache phire'o asate parabe na.
36|51|Ara yakhana singaya phumka deya habe takhana'i tara kabara theke chute asabe tadera rabera dike [1].
36|52|Tara balabe, 'haya! Durbhoga amadera! Ke amaderake amadera nidrasthala theke uthala? Dayamaya allah‌ to era'i pratisruti diyechilena ebam rasulagana satya'i balechilena.’
36|53|Eta habe sudhu eka bikata sabda; takhana'i edera sakalake upasthita kara habe amadera samane
36|54|atahpara aja karo prati kono yuluma kara habe na ebam tomara ya karate sudhu tara'i pratiphala deya habe.
36|55|E dina jannatabasigana anande magna thakabe
36|56|tara ebam tadera strigana susitala chayaya susajjita asane helana diye basabe.
36|57|Sekhane tadera jan'ya phalamula ebam tadera jan'ya banchita samasta kichu
36|58|parama dayalu rabera paksa theke salama, (sadara sambhasana ba nirapatta).
36|59|Ara'he aparadhira! Tomara aja prthaka haye ya'o [1].
